short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Print from your Chrome devices to Workplace Pure

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Konica Minolta Cloud Print allows you to experience the easiest and most comfortable way of printing. Choose from various options and print directly from the application, via browser from your smartphone and tablet or simply print from the Google environment. Print jobs will be send to the Workplace Pure platform and can be released via a secure follow-me authentication on any multifunctional system that is connected to Workplace Pure. Print options such as duplex printing or colour printing can still be individually adapted at the multifunctional system. 

This is the Workplace Pure Browser Extension. Use the Cloud Print of Workplace Pure directly from your Google Chrome browser.
